website_summaries.verdict: Significant fire power and range at a desirable price.
pros: Rapid-fire ability rivals that of other models
cons: Gun may jam if not loaded properly

customer_reviews.title: Good For Pigeon Control :)
customer_reviews.text: First, let me say that I'm not a NERF warrior. (But that sounds like fun!) I got this to shoo away pigeons from our house. Given our property location a 22 or even a pellet rifle was not an option. I though a NERF round would encourage the pigeons to move on. For that it is perfect. This little blaster has the range to shoot a NERF round to the top of our roof (one story house), and the accuracy is quite good. I have now convinced the neighborhood pigeons that the other houses look much more inviting. Thanks Hasbro!
customer_reviews.author: Terry in AZ

customer_reviews.title: This nerf gun is wonderful. I use it to wake up the kids ...
customer_reviews.text: This nerf gun is wonderful. I use it to wake up the kids I nanny when they oversleep. Typically I leave a loaded (but smaller) nerf gun on their nightstand so they're not entirely defenseless. Then war breaks out. I haven't had /too/ many jams, although I will say one was so bad that I took the gun apart (there are LOTS of tiny screws!). But it hasn't happened since (could've been a bad bullet and my own carelessness.)
customer_reviews.author: Chloe L.

customer_reviews.title: Favorite nerf gun so far, but with a catch
customer_reviews.text: After owning for a few months it broke with relatively light usage. The repair was simple, just a cracked internal plastic piece, but hence the three starts. My previous review is below; my favorite of the nerf guns that are hand pump so far- accurate and the dart magazine is great, fits in a few of my other guns as well. the pump handle being on the bottom in the grip position makes it much faster to fire then the ones that the pump is on top. it does jam occasionally if your darts are getting worn (stepped on, played with by a cat ect) but less than most my models
customer_reviews.author: Steve

customer_reviews.title: Darts get stuck in the mechanism
customer_reviews.text: This is a fun dart gun, when it works. Suddenly the darts won't shoot anymore and after a lot of headache the first time this happened we discovered they were getting stuck and sort of scrunched up in the middle of the gun (where a couple are at a time in between being in the cassette and actually being shot). We had to open it up and basically dig out the darts that were stuck with a metal skewer. They were complete trash. Now as soon as it doesn't shoot we know to check there, but we've thrown away numerous darts which is terrible, and still lose some time to time when they get stuck.
customer_reviews.author: Kristen W

customer_reviews.title: Fun!
customer_reviews.text: Update: I wrote my review prematurely and once my son got a little older, he enjoys his gun a lot more since he can cock and shoot on his own. The slider above the trigger is really helpful for clearing up a jammed ammo. I suggest buying a ton of ammo since this thing go through them fairly quickly. It's fun, for a little while. Shooting this thing is fun, loading this thing sucks. After playing with this thing for about a week the bullets starts to take a little shape. If the ammo is not in "like new condition" it will jam. Mines jam every time now. Sits in my son's toy box just collecting dust at this point.
customer_reviews.author: QuyDaddi

customer_reviews.title: We liked this one so much we bought two more
customer_reviews.text: We liked this one so much we bought two more! It does jam on occasion but is easy enough for even my 5 year old to clear once he got the hang of it. I think the darts need to be improved.. The foam seems a little too soft which cause the jam in my humble opinion.. We tried the Retaliatory and Strong Arm but what's the point of having a nerf gun you can't get at least 1 minute of continuous play with!? I wish they sold additional clips for a fast reload.
customer_reviews.author: Scarletrose

customer_reviews.title: HORRIBLE GUN
customer_reviews.text: this is a bad gun. the bullets get jammed very often, it does not shoot well and it messes up your nerf bullets. I usually love nerf but I spent $70 on the regular amazon website and was VERY disappointed. I used it maybe once and the spring that puts the dart in the chamber came out without anyone touching it. it was not broken the first time and the next day the thing came out so now I take too long to just load one bullet manually so do not order this it is horrible.
customer_reviews.author: Kim B

customer_reviews.title: Jams Often
customer_reviews.text: When it works well, it is fun. If seems to jam often with a full magazine. You pump the front handle like a shotgun. What happens is that unless the dart is in the correct position when you go to close the action, the dart gets mangled and you spend the next minute clearing the jam. Buy a lot of extra darts.
customer_reviews.author: M. Schneider

customer_reviews.title: Nerf Guns are always cool!
customer_reviews.text: It's a NERF GUN, what else do we need to know!?! Like most kids, my grandson loves guns. Teaching him to be careful with it, clean up his darts, keep up with his darts, & not damage it is a teaching moment. I'm sure there are kids deprived of the joy of a Nerf gun. Sad. Anyways as far as the gun, it's cool. It fires well, has decent accuracy. It uses the same darts as most of his others. A good addition to his Nerf collection.
customer_reviews.author: Greg R.

customer_reviews.title: Jams continually
customer_reviews.text: We purchased this for our son's Christmas present and by Christmas night it was barely working. The darts continually jam in the chamber and are basically shredded by the time you get them out. Also, at least twice the gun wouldn't do anything even when there were no darts in it. Very disappointed in this product.
customer_reviews.author: LSJ

customer_reviews.title: Don’t buy as a gift!
customer_reviews.text: Bought this as a Christmas gift for my nephew. It did not come with the Nerf Packaging, just a busted ugly box with the gun and parts zip tied to it.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Rip that orange door off!
customer_reviews.text: Save yourself the trouble and get a flathead screwdriver. Then pry that useless orange door out that obstructs you from simply reaching into the breech and pulling out the jammed dart when it eventually happens. So much easier to deal with. Sure, you probably should so things properly and disassemble the gun. I found that in my instance just prying that menace right out worked for me. Will it work for everyone? Probably not.
customer_reviews.author: Truck_Driving_Pottymouth

customer_reviews.title: Your kid needs this, even if you don't!
customer_reviews.text: I got this nerf gun as a Christmas gift for my 8 year old brother! It was part of a deal for Black Friday! I got it for a great price. It was so easy to put together, came with a ton of darts! I also purchased the vest, with extra bullets (etc). Needless to say, this was his favorite Christmas gift. My husband made him some targets, he immediately went outside to start practicing! He was so happy, and I'm so happy I got this for him!!
customer_reviews.author: Jamie Seip

customer_reviews.title: Fun when it works. But does jam a lot
customer_reviews.text: Don’t get me wrong I absolutely love this toy. The kids really have a lot of fun with it and it’s a great intimidator to their friends. The biggest drawback is because of the rapidfire nature of the design it does have the tendency to get jammed very easily and when it does get jammed it will annihilate the Nerf bullet inside of it. So it does chew through ammunition both in play and in its destruction
customer_reviews.author: Hillfamily

customer_reviews.title: Great primary Nerf blaster
customer_reviews.text: The nerf Rampage blaster IMO is one of the best nerf blasters ever. Right out of the box you get a 25 dart drum magazine which can hold 26. The main grip and the pump grip are really comfortable. Its stock velocity is abt 70 feet per second but I threw a Worker upgrade kit with a 5KG spring amd now gets 95-100 FPS. I still have yet to remove all locks like I did in my Elite Alpha Trooper. Overall I recomend this to everyone looking for a solid primary. Ive had it for a year now and still works. Buy it, you wont regret it.
customer_reviews.author: Jason spaeth

customer_reviews.title: DO NOT ORDER!!
customer_reviews.text: This came in a standard cardboard box and thank god i opened it to check it before i gave it to my nephew for christmas as it came as parts taped inside to the box, not even inside a NERF box, no instructions, etc. Obviously a returned item. Immediately returned, terrible. DO NOT ORDER THIS.
customer_reviews.author: Mwadeeb

customer_reviews.title: Would not recommend
customer_reviews.text: We bought this for our grandson for Christmas. The product was missing parts so we returned it for a replacement. This process was AMAZING. The replacement arrived, grandson was excited, put the blaster together and the darts began to jam. I would say about every 4 to 5 dart the blaster jammed and destroyed the dart. Would not recommend this product.
customer_reviews.author: r.maricle

customer_reviews.title: A little disappointed! Is this real Nerf?
customer_reviews.text: So I’ve been to the store and purchased Nerf products before, they always come in a Nerf package and look nice, not sure why when I ordered this it came in a cardboard box and looks like a second hand toy with overspray paint everywhere. This looks like a cheap knockoff! I purchased it as a gift and am not even sure I can give it away because I’m embarrassed of the way it looks.
customer_reviews.author: Gary Huff

customer_reviews.title: Super nerf gun
customer_reviews.text: Another great nerf gun that is now hidden somewhere in my house. Thought it would be a good gift for my bf, but i was silly enough to forget that it would be used against me. It fires quickly, one after another, and has good aim. Need to buy another one to make it a fair fight now. So do yourself a favor and just buy two while you’re ahead.
customer_reviews.author: Jackie

customer_reviews.title: Easy and fun!
customer_reviews.text: I love this gun!!!! Shoots amazingly and with such ease. Comes with 25 super soft darts. Easy to put together and tons of fun!!!!
customer_reviews.author: AMARILIS C

customer_reviews.title: Fun
customer_reviews.text: This is awesome. This holds so many nerf bullets it's crazy. It shoots pretty far, and every time you think it's out, it still has more coming out. Perfect for a nerf war. So much fun to play with.
customer_reviews.author: Jacklyn

customer_reviews.title: Bullets get jammed in the barrel.
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my grandson's Birthday and he really liked it. One huge problem is that bullets get jammed in the gun which are difficult to remove. My son had to use a skinny rod to push them out of the barrel area.
customer_reviews.author: Sharon C.

customer_reviews.title: Great fun...while it lasts!!
customer_reviews.text: I love nerd guns and associate their name with quality. My grandson received this gun as a gift for Christmas. A month later, it broke. We attributed to the fact he was 7 years old. For his bday in February, we bought him a new one. This one didn’t even last a month. We did salvage the round piece that holds the bullets as it fits on another gun that has lasted. I’d stay away from this one!!
customer_reviews.author: R. Dyer

customer_reviews.title: No Assembly Directions?
customer_reviews.text: Where are the directions? The item is in a non descript brown box with absolutely zero directions, NO directions at all on how to assemble or use at all, watched a few YouTube videos but none really show assembly but figured it out. Now it’s jammed and won’t allow me to take drum off at all
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Don’t waste your cash like I did
customer_reviews.text: My boys got these for Christmas. First one broke after 3 days, second one lasted almost 3 weeks. The magazine is hard to release and it jams constantly. The jams are a pain for fix due to the design. Wish I had saved the packaging so I could get my money back.
customer_reviews.author: Kevin

customer_reviews.title: he's happy with
customer_reviews.text: Kids convinced me to allow them to spend their birthday gift cards on nerf guns, because "mom, just in case zombies come we will be ready". Who can argue against that? What kind of mom would i be? My son's only complain is that sometimes the bullets get stuck or twisted in this gun. Then we have to work at getting the nerf bullet out. Otherwise, he's happy with it
customer_reviews.author: Ryan and Sarah

customer_reviews.title: Nerf nerds unite!
customer_reviews.text: This, gun, is, BADASS!!!! Whoever is complaining it gets jammed has never owned any form of firearm. I got 2 of them and they work perfectly. Christmas morning was a total "hit". Pun intended. I had to get a second drum just to make sure I'm always at the ready.
customer_reviews.author: txsbullfrog

customer_reviews.title: Fun & sounds intimidating. Don't buy it for kids under like 10
customer_reviews.text: Bought this gun for my boyfriend, 19. The cocking mechanism makes this gun seem very intimidating which is kind of fun when he's chasing me around the house. Wouldn't recommend for younger children who aren't mature or responsible as this gun requires proper loading of the detachable barrel & can often become jammed which needs to be fixed appropriately. Furthermore, these bullets can hurt since they can travel pretty fast & kids always like to aim for the face. Kids 10 & up would probably be best for this gun. Had an 8 year old try to play with it & he just couldn't follow the instructions on how it operated so yeah... Overall a fun gun.
customer_reviews.author: Natalie Grosch

customer_reviews.title: Jams a LOt!
customer_reviews.text: It is a great gun, when it works. Problem is that every 5 to 10 shots a bullet jams. Like bends in half, in the barrel, jams. Then I have to use a chop stick to get it out.
customer_reviews.author: Bethany

customer_reviews.title: Broken after one round of playing
customer_reviews.text: We have many versions of Nerf Guns, but this is NOT the one to buy. After one round of shots, the gun is now jamming on each shot. I didn't expect the guns to last forever, but after 10 minutes? The bullets were reloaded correctly the second time, the guns just won't work now.
customer_reviews.author: J. Clendenen

customer_reviews.title: Comes in a plain ugly brown box inappropriate for gift giving
customer_reviews.text: Please note: this toy comes in a plain ugly box inappropriate for gift giving. It does not come in the cute box pictured here with pictures. This is what the description means by recyclable and easy to open apparently. Should be straightforward about this point because it matters to the child receiving the gift.
customer_reviews.author: amazonshpr

customer_reviews.title: good deal
customer_reviews.text: we got this for are son for his birthday and think the nabor might have stole it off are porch when it came and amazon was quick to send us another with no problem thank u amazon good ppl to deal with most the time
customer_reviews.author: daisy f.

customer_reviews.title: this jams don't buy
customer_reviews.text: this gun is a neat idea but not engineered well ... i spend more time clearing jams than my son does playing with it. if the dart is even the slightest bit deformed in any way it WILL jam. huge disappointment. initially loading the magazine worked well but before long it became difficult. i had to fiddle with the dial while putting darts in, otherwise they would jammed get crushed and misaligned. save your self the disappointment and frustration DONT BUY
customer_reviews.author: Andrew C.

customer_reviews.title: My nine-year-old son loves this gun!
customer_reviews.text: My son absolutely loves this gun and he is 9! It works well and dose not jam up when you’re trying to shoot the darts . The only drawback is it takes a while to load it back up. Which is not always a bad thing 😉
customer_reviews.author: Amy

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Nerf gun!!!
customer_reviews.text: This gun is awesome! The kids enjoy maybe just a bit more than I do.... Only time there is a jamming issue is when using an old bent dart. The gun is slightly picky with the quality of dart, which they do get smashed a bit when reloading the drum. Otherwise the gun has great distance and accuracy. The rapid fire feature is fun and you can shoot all the darts in a matter of a minute. Much better than the Nerf guns that shoot the discs. Those tend to not shoot straight longer than a month, maybe two after getting.
customer_reviews.author: Brian

customer_reviews.title: Gun jams
customer_reviews.text: My grandsons love nerf guns but this one has been a big disappointment. When received it jammed frequently cancelling out the benefit of the cartridge with lots of nerf bullets. Now, after low usage, it jams every time and is unusable. This was not a good purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Boom Boom

customer_reviews.title: Not worth the money to purchase.
customer_reviews.text: My son was incredibly disappointed as this machine does not work. The bullets get stuck in the chamber, so after shooting one bullet, the next one is ruined by not loading properly. I will be returning this item. Not worth the money, even when it was a great deal. A shame.
customer_reviews.author: Michelle B.

customer_reviews.title: Barely works.
customer_reviews.text: When it works, it works very well. Accuracy is better than nearly any other Nerf gun I’ve ever used and it has some impressive range. The major downside is that it jams constantly. My kids and I have ruined basically every Nerf dart in the house using this thing. I really like the idea of the design and my kids are huge fans, but I can’t recommend it due to the fact that it’s nearly never works properly and literally ruins your darts. But hey, I guess it’s a good way for Nerf to sell more darts, eh?
customer_reviews.author: Ian

customer_reviews.title: Great blaster!
customer_reviews.text: This is an AWESOME blaster! It only jams with user error, has great power, the slam fire works like a charm, the drum mag works great, it has lots of darts, and it feels awesome! The only 2 things hindering this awesome blaster is it's size, as somebody under 10 would have major problems due to the blaster's size, and it was discontinued in stores, so it costs a little more than usual.
customer_reviews.author: Verve Mama

customer_reviews.title: Repeated Jamming Problems with Rampage
customer_reviews.text: Really, really disappointed with the Rampage. Did tons of research, talked with friends, etc. The Rampage I bought for my son's birthday constantly jams. Must've thrown out a few dozen darts already that it has destroyed due to jamming issues -- after less than a month with moderate usage. Also bought the Rapidstrike, Strongarm and the Triad. Rarely have jamming problems with those. I just missed the return window, too! When it works, it's awesome. But it jams so often it's practically a waste of money for me and, more importantly, I have a disappointed child on my hands.
customer_reviews.author: J2J

customer_reviews.title: Jambs Excessively
customer_reviews.text: My grandson was so excited to receive this gun but, was almost instantly too frustrated with the constant jambing that he put it down and now won't play with it because it won't work.
customer_reviews.author: Little Dreamer

customer_reviews.title: Super fun!
customer_reviews.text: Awesome find in the “like new” category. Item appear to be brand new in box. My 6yr old son loves! Easy to use and load, even for younger child! Makes for great family nerf wars.
customer_reviews.author: Amanda G

customer_reviews.title: Best NERF Gun Yet!
customer_reviews.text: Best NERF gun yet! Bought two for my son and I to play with ... make sure your kiddos treat the action, receiver, and magazine with consideration that they are plastic and to clear the receiver before re-loading. Even if you cause a jam, the clearing process is very simple. Ordered additional package of darts as they will end up underneath furniture! Have fun!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Dont buy eleite rampage
customer_reviews.text: I like the high capacity magazine, but this model jams way too much...only really got one day out of it...slam fire didnt work either it kept jamming...i bought a surgefire which was much more reliable...i would not recommend this model. I bought two elite rampages.
customer_reviews.author: Cojo

customer_reviews.title: disappionted
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my son for Christmas. It jams all the time with bullets and we have had to cut several out. I would not but this again. My son is very disappointed because he loves to have Nerf wars.
customer_reviews.author: Annette

customer_reviews.title: Spread fear with sounds of pump action.
customer_reviews.text: Send darts of doom hurdling towards your target. Nothing beats the racking sound, because it let's your target know you mean business. If you buy after market darts beware of people cowering of fear from the stiffer tips.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Holds many rounds, easy to use
customer_reviews.text: This nerf blaster was for my 'big kid' turning 40! He loved it. One of my son's friends (11yrs old) used it and requested it for his birthday, also. We have now bought 2 of them and have some happy boys.
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer

customer_reviews.title: Jams and Rips the Heads off the Nerf Bullets
customer_reviews.text: BLUF: Don't Waste Your Time or Money! My son recently purchased this with money he earned and we are very disappointed with the quality of this Nerf gun. Within 2 days of use it constantly jammed, ripped and tore the heads off the Nerf bullets, and the drum had to be forced to function correctly. I'm returning this chunk of plastic and giving my son back his hard earned money!
customer_reviews.author: William Bailey

customer_reviews.title: Holds a ton of ammo!
customer_reviews.text: We purchased this for our son's birthday, along with the tactical vest and he loves it. The darts have great distance with this gun and the fact that it holds so many darts is awesome. Our only issue with it is that it does seem to chew the darts up regularly... thank goodness for the 100 count refill packs!! :)
customer_reviews.author: Busy Mom of Three

customer_reviews.title: Junk!!!
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this for my nephew at Christmas because he loves Nerf. However, it didn't even come in a complete box. When he tried to use it the foam darts got stuck and no matter how much we worked on it we could not get it to work. I felt bad since this was his Christmas present. I ended up going to the store and buying him a new one.
customer_reviews.author: Megan  G

customer_reviews.title: Jams
customer_reviews.text: This thing looks super awesome, but the one I got was not. It always jammed, usually after 2 or 3 darts. And when it does, it pretty much chews up the darts to a useless pulp. It's also a bit difficult to stuff the darts into the "cartridge." After the 5th dart, I find myself figuring out creative ways to hold the darts in so they don't pop back out via spring action. This might contribute to all the jams, but I don't know how else to restock the darts.
customer_reviews.author: BinYong

customer_reviews.title: Jams like crazy, but pretty servicable
customer_reviews.text: Rapid fire mode and single shot mode work as advertised. Fires reasonably straight for the first 15 feet. However, this unit jams like crazy, requiring frequent intervention to correct it. The magazine tends to lock up frequently, so the 9 year old gets rather frustrated. The ELITE Disruptor is a better model, in my opinion.
customer_reviews.author: N. Fiedler

customer_reviews.title: Garbage
customer_reviews.text: If I could give this nerf gun no stars I would. I gave it to my son this morning for his birthday. It’s been jamming all day. It finally completely stopped working and it’s not even the evening. It jams in every chamber bends the nerf pellets . I hate this product. I will try to return it, if not it’s going on the trash. Do not buy this nerf gun what a piece of cheaply made garbage.
customer_reviews.author: kathy

customer_reviews.title: Great gift but can jam
customer_reviews.text: Gave as a gift to my boyfriend and he absolutely loves it. The reason I gave it four stars instead of five is that the darts jam if you're not careful to cock and load it all the way. I am much smaller than my boyfriend and not as strong so I am not able to fully cock it properly (especially when I'm trying to do it quickly) but he has not problem. Another plus with this is that there's a special chamber you can open to extract jammed darts. Sure comes in handy. Comes with very simple and thorough instructions about how to attach all parts and set it up. Wish it came with a shoulder stock though.
customer_reviews.author: Sarah

customer_reviews.title: Nerf Gun Jams
customer_reviews.text: This gun jams. Then jams again. If looking though for a gun for a younger kid and less loading this is your guy. We taught the toddler to place/point the gun. Down and press on the pump.
customer_reviews.author: Melissa M.

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful
customer_reviews.text: Gave this to my 7 year for Christmas. ONE thing it doesn't have a butt on it. BUT that was my fault, I did not read it fully...however you can get one. My son loves it even without a butt...
customer_reviews.author: Marlene Schramm

customer_reviews.title: Gun jams
customer_reviews.text: Gun came and my son was so excited. It looked really cool, but when he went to use it, it jammed. I fixed the jam, but about every other shot it jamed again. After about 30 min of jam after jam my son gave up. Very disappointing.
customer_reviews.author: Holly H.

customer_reviews.title: Grandson loved it!
customer_reviews.text: The product came packaged as though it was brand new. It was a wonderful value considering it cost a small percentage of the same toy new. My grandsons were thrilled!
customer_reviews.author: Catherine

customer_reviews.title: Overall Great Gun But It Jams Frequently
customer_reviews.text: Great gun. Bullets Jam frequently so the gun is largely useless.
customer_reviews.author: Michael S. Vickers

customer_reviews.title: The boy loves it!
customer_reviews.text: This is my 9 year old favorite blaster yet! It packs a lot of power!
customer_reviews.author: Nycole Ferguson

customer_reviews.title: Jams
customer_reviews.text: It’s a nice sturdy blaster, but the drum frequently jams which has ruined many darts. My son found it difficult to use and had to often ask me to unjam it.
customer_reviews.author: Dude dad teacher

customer_reviews.title: probably the best cartridge blaster by Nerf
customer_reviews.text: Solid blaster for the price. You won't be sorry with this purchase, probably the best cartridge blaster by Nerf.
customer_reviews.author: Kris

customer_reviews.title: Not great for little kids
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my 7 year old. It’s a fun fun, but it jams a lot. Probably better for older kids that can be a bit more careful.
customer_reviews.author: ExtremeLearningGuy

customer_reviews.title: Powerful!
customer_reviews.text: My sons love this Christmas gift. I'm a typical west-coast-semi-disapproving-but-ultimately-thinks-nerf-is-pretty-flipping-fun kind of mom. Apparently, this Nerf gun is great because it's big, powerful, and has the rack on the bottom. It seems to get jammed more often than their other Nerf guns, which is the only negative. This can probably be remedied with careful magazine loading. Overall, a total hit with its intended audience.
customer_reviews.author: Rebecca B

customer_reviews.title: Packs a good punch. Magazine can be a bit tricky to load for a kid.
customer_reviews.text: My kid loves it. The magazine can jam if not carefully loaded, but otherwise this thing packs a pretty good punch. Definitely recommend wearing eye and face protection. Also support some of the modular rail options that the kids like to mix and match their arsenal.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Don't buy
customer_reviews.text: Looks great. Love how it holds 25 bullets. Problem: 1st try after opening as a Christmas gift, it kept jamming and chewing up the bullets!! Definitely going back!
customer_reviews.author: pmc

customer_reviews.title: Worth it
customer_reviews.text: My son is 4 and took him a couple days to figure this out but he did and he loves it, I would recommend
customer_reviews.author: Richard Daugherty

customer_reviews.title: Loves it!
customer_reviews.text: My kid just loves this. Loading is a little temperamental, so take your time so you don't break it -- esp. at first. Help a child load so they understand how to do it correctly and it won't break. I only hate that I'm the target of the bullets!
customer_reviews.author: Maria

customer_reviews.title: Fun toy
customer_reviews.text: My done was given this for Christmas. He hasn’t put it down yet. It shoots well and no problems with jamming.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Suppress your opponents with the rapid slam fire action.
customer_reviews.text: Works great, rarely jams, and comes with a round drum that holds 25-26 darts which is great to use on fully automatic blasters for suppression fire. The rampages biggest downfall is range. With some modifications, I’m sure that won’t be a problem for some.
customer_reviews.author: Kingosoby

customer_reviews.title: Doesn't work
customer_reviews.text: Wanted to love but the gun get jammed every single time you go to shoot. Sending back
customer_reviews.author: sm347804

customer_reviews.title: One of three broke in first hour
customer_reviews.text: We bought 3 of these for grandsons... they were delighted with them and excited to go out to the park to play with them. Unfortunately, 1 of the three got a dart jammed in the loader, and after freeing it, the gun no longer moves any darts into the chamber. Very unfortunate.
customer_reviews.author: Frank D Daukas

customer_reviews.title: Fun
customer_reviews.text: My husband and I bought these to have a nurf war and as 21 and 22 year olds we approve
customer_reviews.author: Kayle

customer_reviews.title: Works good...till it doesn't
customer_reviews.text: Everything seemed fine at first till my nephew came up to me upset it was jammed. I looked down the barrel and the bullets had gotten sideways halfway down the gun. It was NOT fun getting out, but a few chewed up nerf bullets later it came out. This thing should be kid proof.
customer_reviews.author: nick

customer_reviews.title: Fun but complicated
customer_reviews.text: Such a sweet gun, but the spring on the cocking mechanism wore down after a few months. If you’re not careful, the nerf darts will get jammed.
customer_reviews.author: Lindy Strahan

customer_reviews.title: Good gift
customer_reviews.text: My nephew loved it and his brother and sister always want to play with it. Overall a great toy.
customer_reviews.author: Jerry C

customer_reviews.title: Great nerfgun.  Nice price.
customer_reviews.text: Awesome drum mag. No batteries slide action. Feels good and shoots well. Sweet.
customer_reviews.author: crAsh

customer_reviews.title: FUN!!
customer_reviews.text: So much fun!! Bought this for my husband and my 2 sons, ages 16 & 24. They had a blast with these on Christmas!!
customer_reviews.author: Laura D

customer_reviews.title: What can I say NERF
customer_reviews.text: Its WAY smaller then what you think the picture looks .Oh well my 11 yr old Grandson will love it.
customer_reviews.author: Cindy Crick

customer_reviews.title: Fun gift
customer_reviews.text: Made an excellent gift and the other kids all wanted to try it out as well!
customer_reviews.author: lpitz

customer_reviews.title: Darts get jammed too easily
customer_reviews.text: This thing jams up more than it actually shoots, & loading / unloading / troubleshooting the jam is complicated & frustrating.
customer_reviews.author: Sharlay Phoenix

customer_reviews.title: Fun for 10 year old
customer_reviews.text: My 10 year old likes it. It’s s little tricky teaching him to pull forward then shoot. It wants to get jammed if you don’t fully push forward all the way.
customer_reviews.author: S. Brown

customer_reviews.title: Darts get stuck inside
customer_reviews.text: Fun fun for my 8 year old, but the dang darts keep getting lodged inside so he hasn't even gotten to play with it much, it's always on the counter waiting for dad to fix it.
customer_reviews.author: Daniel Alman

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: This Nerf gun is so much fun... EPIC Nerf battles have been played with it!
customer_reviews.author: Cyb3rPh0bia

customer_reviews.title: fun, but jams!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this gun for the office Nerf war games. Overall its a pretty cool toy. I can shoot officemates from the other side of the room, and the tommy-gun style drum magazine is a lot of fun to load. Once you get the hang of it you can hit someone with five or six darts in a row. Pros: the big magazine, rate of fire, range, and its just a big impressive nerf weapon. Cons: gun jams too often and its a pain to recover from jams when you're being shot at.
customer_reviews.author: Ben Hsu

customer_reviews.title: My young grandson is just gonna love this
customer_reviews.text: My young grandson is just gonna love this! He’s going to play Nerf guns with his brother for the next six months.
customer_reviews.author: Junglemom1963Top Contributor: Pets

customer_reviews.title: At best defective at worst bad manufacture design. Won't recommend!
customer_reviews.text: Had to return as wouldn't load darts and smashed darts as you loaded them
customer_reviews.author: Peggytwitty

customer_reviews.title: Fun, with a hiccup or two.
customer_reviews.text: This is a great gun, but it seems to jam at times. he's figured out how to clear it, and how to minimize it from happening, but sometimes even when he does everything right, it jams. Not *every* time, or even a lot, but enough to be annoying when it happens. He gives it a 4 out of 5, because "When it works, its awesome!"
customer_reviews.author: Jim Besso

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: We really liked this item. My son has tons of fun with it.
customer_reviews.author: Annie

customer_reviews.title: Defective piece of junk.
customer_reviews.text: Right out of the box this thing didn't work. The slide was locked in the forward position. Tried to release the slide by pressing on the handle release button as instructed in the directions, but no joy. Even the jam clearing door was jammed.
customer_reviews.author: T Jay

customer_reviews.title: Would buy again and again.
customer_reviews.text: We bought two of these over Black Friday and we should have bought more for the adults in our family! Such a fun family night activity. Would make a great gift too.
customer_reviews.author: Michael Martone

customer_reviews.title: glowing review from the child
customer_reviews.text: Nerf rampage and strike elite toy was a gift for a child. We received a glowing review from the child regarding this Nerf gun
customer_reviews.author: Npier

customer_reviews.title: Really good distance on these
customer_reviews.text: Really good distance on these. The product is great when it works. Often jams though in the middle of a game. When it jams I have to remove the magazine and use my finger to pry the nerf bullets out of the chamber.
customer_reviews.author: Joshua Pye

customer_reviews.title: It's a steal
customer_reviews.text: I have so many Nerf guns, and this is my favorite one. It shoots fast, does not jam (if you use it properly), does not require batteries, and it looks awesome. It is also small enough to use a big drum and it's not uncomfortable at all. And the price is a steal for how good it performs. Great purchase!!!!
customer_reviews.author: Carolyn Stefos

customer_reviews.title: Nerf Fun
customer_reviews.text: Fun toy for grandchild. Used to shoot targets. Accurate and dependable. Good for indoors.
customer_reviews.author: anonymous

customer_reviews.title: Jam,jam and more jamming
customer_reviews.text: Awful product. It jam more than it can shoot. Not worth it for the price.
customer_reviews.author: Tommy

customer_reviews.title: Fun toy for everyone
customer_reviews.text: My son loved this. Make sure you also buy the extra bullets.
customer_reviews.author: Anonymous

customer_reviews.title: Awesome gun!!
customer_reviews.text: Got it for a six year old nephew. He loved it. Immediately shot everyone. It is a cocking action one and fairly large so probably not great for really little kids, but he's a huge 6 year old. I think any kid 5+ could use it easily enough.
customer_reviews.author: Jinxgirl

customer_reviews.title: Good Buy
customer_reviews.text: Shoots good, no issues, fun for my 12 year old son
customer_reviews.author: Mary

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed
customer_reviews.text: Was advertised as packaged in Need box, was NOT. Also advertised as 2 types 25 each of the bullets. Did not have only had one package.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

product_meta.title: Nerf Rampage N-Strike Elite Toy Blaster with 25 Dart Drum Slam Fire & 25 Official Elite Foam Darts for Kids, Teens, & Adults (Amazon Exclusive)
product_meta.description:
When the mission calls for serious firepower, bring along the Nerf N Strike elite Rampage blaster that packs a high capacity 25 dart drum and comes with 25 official Nerf elite darts. Shoot a rapid fire dart Storm at targets with the toy Blaster’s slam fire action as you hold down the trigger and keep sliding the handle to unleash ALL 25 darts fast. The Rampage Nerf Blaster is manually operated no batteries required so you're in control as you Prime and fire by hand. This blue N Strike elite blaster for kids, teens, and adults is designed for distance, sending darts Streaking through the air up to 90 feet (27 meters). The Nerf Rampage toy blaster comes with 25 official Nerf elite darts that are designed for distance, tested and approved for performance and quality, and constructed of foam with flexible, hollow tips so they're fun to blast and get blasted with indoors and outdoors. Nerf and all related properties are trademarks of Hasbro.

FROM THE MANUFACTURER
It's time to take your N-Strike battling to the next level with the Rampage blaster. With a 25-dart drum magazine, the Rampage blaster gives you an incredible rapid-fire blitz, firing revolutionary Elite Darts at a range of 75'. Release a storm of darts at your target by sliding the slam fire handle repeatedly while you hold down the trigger. The drum magazine works with other Clip System blasters (sold separately), and the Elite Darts work with any Elite blaster and most original N-Strike blasters (sold separately). For the final word in today's blaster technology, you need the Elite customization and interchangeable parts of the Rampage blaster.
feature_bullets: High capacity 25 dart drum: The Nerf Rampage blaster’s drum holds up to 25 darts and includes 25 official Nerf Elite foam darts giving you plenty of firepower for Nerf battles
Slam fire action for rapid dart blasting: shoot a rapid fire dart Storm at targets with the toy blaster’s slam fire action feature as you hold down the trigger and slide the handle
Hand powered blasting up to 90 feet (27 meters): you're in control as you prime and fire the Rampage Nerf blaster by hand; No batteries required and send darts flying up to 90 feet (27 meters)
Includes 25 darts: includes 25 official Nerf Elite darts that are designed for distance, tested and approved for performance and quality, and constructed of foam with flexible, hollow tips
